name: DETESTATION
description:
WARNING: THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA BUILD

CHECK OUR DISCORD TO JOIN THE COMMUNITY: https://discord.gg/M3kNS2thf8

Inspired, both mechanically as well as artistically, by games such as Quake, DUKE3D and DOOM.

This game gives you the opportunity to massacre disgusting mutated rats, felling godlike all the while.

No need for tutorials - you'll figure it out, just get out there, damn it!

CREDITS:

Michael Hamilton: Music/Sound Effects (https://www.michaelhamiltonmusic.co.uk/)

Boggle: Additional Assets (Enemies, etc.) / Animations.

Me: Level-/Game-Design, Programming and Project Management.
